contentfulSermon.title: This Functional Family: Week 3 - Raising Kids God's Way

fields.notesFormatted:
Every kid needs to have:

Ephesians 6:1-4, Proverbs 13:24, 14:26, 22:6, Mark 3:24-25, Joshua 24:1

  1. An example to follow.
    • Focus more on GOD than MVP or GPA.
  2. A home to run to, not run from.
    • Seek to understand, not to be understood.
    • You can pay now, or youâ€™ll pay later.
  3. Priority over your schedule.
    • Kids spell love T-I-M-E.
  4. The benefit of the doubt.
